website_summaries.verdict: Those who are looking for something different in a CD player may be impressed with its unique features and smart technology, but it has some limitations over traditional models and doesn't produce the best sound.
pros: An impressive player for a low price that's like 5 devices in 1 – boombox, Bluetooth speaker, FM radio, and U-disk/CD player
Boasts a slim, attractive design that can be mounted on the wall
cons: Remote doesn't have very long range
A bit challenging to set up, especially if you aren't very tech-savvy

customer_reviews.title: Wow !!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship on this item. I read the reviews before I purchased this item and they were mostly positive. I was honestly amazed at the quality of this item! It’s user friendly and the compact size fits great on the wall! The sound fills the room and I love the remote! It also came with some extras I was not expecting ... a stand and the AUX line. I am VERY happy with this purchase ! Would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Mona Angel

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it 4 or 5 days and they already want a review- okay. Speakers are alright if I'm working in my garage but inside I have Bluetooth speakers that sound better. The controls take some patience and getting used to, but after some use become less cumbersome. I like that you can stop a CD, even turn it off, and when you start up again it keeps playing right where you left off. Also I like loading music on to a flash drive and letting playback for hours without hearing the same song. Love that it plays MP3s! Very good sound! Hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: ralph blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing look ! Works great !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy ! Works great and looks amazing on my living room !
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY disappointed! I purchased this and sent it to my ...
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY disappointed! I purchased this and sent it to my daughter as a gift. She got it out of the box and set it up. It shorts out constantly. The hanging power cord is like a loose tooth! Barely touch it and the unit shuts off. When you finally get it to stay on it plays for about 10 seconds and then shuts off. Is anybody else having problems with the pull cord at all? How do I send this back if I bought it on my account but it's a gift for someone? I'm hoping either Amazon or the company makes good on this. She's VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Won't play CDs after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in the kitchen to play CDs. It is aesthetically perfect...modern looking and non-obtrusive, but 5 months after buying it, it doesn't recognize CDs anymore. They just sit and spin and never play. Really disappointed because I loved it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Blair-Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Used 6 times over 10 months and now will turn on but won’t play and then shuts itself off. I do not suggest anyone buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Having Major issues!
customer_reviews.text: If the sellers are reading this, I would like to return this for a refund. It takes FOREVER to start playing, it makes very loud noises before it starts playing, it won't skip to the next track (It will only play from the first track), the sound quality makes very large jumps so that I can't get to the volume level I want, the LED light is too bright... to name a few. There are some good things to say, but I see no reason to mention them because of the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Compact and mighty. Seller responded quickly to questions and replaced remote when we had an issue. Great
customer_reviews.author: ncw

customer_reviews.title: Stops Frequently
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my office. It shuts off after a few songs. I've tried it with a variety of CD's, so I know the CD is not the problem. I was thinking I paid for a quality product. It was very difficult to locate the review option and apparently the time for a refund has lapsed already. This is junk.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Last

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple days of use it no longer plays CDs which is the whole reason we purchased it. We used it for a birthday gift so by the time we gifted it and used it for a couple of days it was no longer eligible for returns. Very upset. Completely useless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived very fast and very well packed
customer_reviews.text: this is such a great purchase in my life, can't believe I haven't bought it earlier! now I can listen to all of my cd and connect to my phone and listen to my favorite music in good quality, also when watching movies on the laptop the sound is so-so, so watching movies through the bluetooth of this player makes the huge difference and i can finally enjoy with the sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't seem consistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit to play music in my bedroom. It delivers satisfactory sound, and the remote control works well. however, when I turn the unit off using the pullcord as it is designed, it appears to reset itself, and starts over on the first song on the CD at full volume. It was not on the first song, and was at reduced volume when I turned it off. This bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: photosteve13

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look and good quality of sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute and easy to use CD player! I initially saw a similar player on Tick Tock but for a $30 markup with attractive packaging. This looks exactly the same but is much more affordable. I was skeptical of the sound quality, but I was pleasantly surprised. The only downside is that if you like to listen to quieter music, the sound of the CD spinning may be a bit loud for that.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Works well but don’t expect studio quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount on the wall everything seems Very sturdy and decently made. Cd stays in the unit family with no danger of falling out even when playing and upside down. I would say it’s a decent buy. Don’t expect anything really amazing in terms of audio quality though. It is not a stereo system type sound it’s just a speaker. It got the job done and that’s what I needed. If you’re not too picky about audio quality than this is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, tinny sound and no way to keep dust out of laser mechanism. Not worth sale price of $40. I would rather spend on a unit with better sound quality and likely better durability.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: It just feels like light plastic CD player with nothing inside
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t work at all. We’ve tried putting in brand-new batteries... nothing. Plugged directly into outlet... nothing. Bluetooth... nothing. It just feels like light plastic CD player with nothing inside, the same for the remote.
customer_reviews.author: bsalarzon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This good-looking CD player is totally worth the price! I use it to play the CDs while relaxing in the living room and the sound quality is pretty good. Sometimes l listen to the radio while I am cleaning the house. Good design and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We can not get radio where we live and I wanted some way to play my CD's in different rooms but needed it to be small.... this is PERFECT... When my daughter got married, she blue toothed her phone into it and played music while we spent the morning getting ready.... in fact, when ever the kids come to visit, they blue tooth into it and play their music LOL-- I really love the portability !!!
customer_reviews.author: Denah

customer_reviews.title: Cd plyer
customer_reviews.text: nice cd player. Good sound with its speakers, I was pleasantly surprised. Would be 4 stars if it had a cover and the remote wasn't so flimsy. Not sure if it will collect dust being open without a cover but I keep an old cd in it just in case. I am a little worried about the remote because cannot work it without it. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: JHLV

customer_reviews.title: Querky
customer_reviews.text: I have only played CDs so far, and the sound quality is pretty good. It seems to have a mind of it's own though. It pauses itself at unexpected times. Not too happy about that. I also found that it doesn't always begin to play at the beginning of the CD, but some random spot mid piece. I haven't made up mind about this thing yet.
customer_reviews.author: kennel girl

customer_reviews.title: Looks are decieving
customer_reviews.text: From the beginning this CD player has been so sensitive....working one minute and then just shutting off. Through out the last year of having it we have hardly used it because of this reason. We pulled it out over Christmas and tried to get it to work, buying a new battery for the remote but to no good end...... the CD player no longer works and only the radio will play. I love the look of it but if it doesn't work...well....kind of a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, minor defect issues
customer_reviews.text: When playing the CD, it stops after the 7th track and if you what to skip to the next song, it starts in he middle of the song. This was a gift for my daughter but I'll have to return it. UPDATE: The company was easy to work with and I received a refund and an offer to try out another CD player once they've fixed the defects.
customer_reviews.author: R. Draper

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to start using my bts albums and actually listen to the cds and it’s kinda pricey but really worth it and the wall mount minimalistic aesthetic makes it really cute decor !
customer_reviews.author: Mayc

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sound, very compact
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a CD player to learn foreign languages, and this item has lots more features than I need - but they will come in handy someday. Sound quality is outstanding, and I like that it's small and so portable that I can put it anywhere in the living room, bedroom, kitchen, etc. Beautiful design. Friends have commented how well it sounds, and expressed interest in getting one for themselves - or their teenagers! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great For Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: It looks and sounds great. I can't get the remote to work. I read the troubleshooting steps, but it still isn't working. It's probably my fault because I'm not technology savvy.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the quality
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised, but the speakers do buzz even on low settings. I use it for soft music during meditation or when drawing or writing in my carpeted, very small office. Some CDs sound better than others on it, but I don't know why. It's good enough, but for the money I think it should perform better.
customer_reviews.author: Gini Kalton

customer_reviews.title: Love the wall mount feature!
customer_reviews.text: Great compact CD player --love the fact it mounts on the wall and I don't need to find a table top place for it. The first one worked well for several months only to suddenly stop working. The seller immediately responded to my email and sent a replacement within days. It's working great and I'm so pleased with the customer service, I will buy from them whenever possible.
customer_reviews.author: FishingFool

customer_reviews.title: Excellent player for the money
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the positive reviews I was expecting a lot, and it didn’t disappoint. For the price, this is an excellent music player. I copied about 200+ songs onto a flash drive, plugged it in, and it works great. It sounds very good in my garage, and it is well built. While putting in the flash drive, I pushed it too hard and the unit came out of its holder where it crashed to the concrete floor. I put it back, and it started working perfectly and exactly where it left off. BillJ -
customer_reviews.author: BillJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for audiobooks on CD
customer_reviews.text: So far it's exactly what we were looking for. We wanted a CD player for audiobooks that would resume or bookmark when restarted. This player does just that within a minute of where it left off. If you turn the power off and on (do not press stop) it will resume. So excited to listen on the treadmill without searching each time for the track I was listening too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little CD player
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little CD player - especially given the cost. Just what I needed to make it possible for me to continue to be able to enjoy my CD's. P.S. The "on/off" pull string pictured is actually the AC cord... took me a while to figure that out... who would have thunk it? Frank
customer_reviews.author: Reader12147

customer_reviews.title: Great product and much more than just a cd player
customer_reviews.text: We love this item in our church nursery. We put up high on the shelf so the kids can’t reach, but the little remote allows us the turn up or down change the song or play again. The kids live it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even turn on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my mom, turns out, it doesn’t even turn on, what am I supposed to do with it?
customer_reviews.author: Diego Luna

customer_reviews.title: Plays great
customer_reviews.text: The advertised Blue tooth capability refers to linking your device (phone, mp3 player) to this player. You can blue tooth to external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus Chafin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best CD player I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Anybody who has lot of CD music or love audio book like I do should look in to this. Delivery is surprisingly quick and very to use and sound quality is awesome. Batteries are not include for remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Kim-in-Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! I'm so glad I decided to buy this instead of buying the more expensive one that is all over Instagram seeing as how it's exactly the same device. The sound quality is great and it's really easy to use since it's equipped with and AUX connection, Bluetooth, and radio on top of having the CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Should buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love the first time I opened the package. It was so pretty and neat which also fitted my bedroom quite well. The sound quality is overall amazing. Has so many features and the volume range is quite decent. Really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker as something to play my CDs, but I didn't expect it to be so cool! It plays any CD you have, the remote works from anywhere, and it's sleek as hell. It even looks nice as a display item. My one complaint is that the quality isn't the best but it doesn't bother me much when I can listen to my favorite albums on blast. It even has a shuffle mode!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Compact, lightweight, portable, versatile, has no trouble with any of our homemade CDs with MP3 files, good sound quality, nice remote, USB interface is great. The instructions could use some editing, but that's about it. Would suggest some sort of lightweight, snap-in cover for the CD area to keep it as clean as possible. Also, a carrying case would be a great accessory.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent size. It is loud enough to hear all the way to my living room but I think it depends on the room space. It looks really cute in my room. Honestly, I bought it because of how it looked and not how it sounds, but I was surprised that it also has radio and Bluetooth. It came in a cute package. I really enjoy how simple it is to use. I don't write reviews, but I am really satisfied with this purchase. I originally only bought it to play my TWICE CDs :/ lol. I actually use it for more than that now.
customer_reviews.author: Lailanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my craft room and it is just what I was looking for. Love the remote control and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: katharine

customer_reviews.title: this is a good unit. Keep in mind the speakers are part ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a good unit. Keep in mind the speakers are part of the unit so it's not something that will crank out a high volume of undistorted sound. Setting radio stations is not that easy and takes quite a while and there is no visual of what station you are on. But so far it has performed flawlessly and is a unique player, for under $100.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. The sound quality is good for such a small piece and finally my husband can listen to his gigantic collection of 90's grunge music...as long as I'm not home...
customer_reviews.author: jsmith4

customer_reviews.title: nice...I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have it in my music studio and as a private teacher ise it to play excerpts of things they are learning to play. My studio is small so having the wall mount option is great but then to be able to take it off the wall and move to another room is a great option. Still trying to figure out the bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: TAP

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part we really like this. In fact we will plan on getting more for the kids rooms because they can mount on the wall and be out of the way. My only problem is that you almost NEED the remote control. There are very few function buttons on the player. So don’t lose that remote!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good, most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, most of the time. Overall good product but it acts flaky at times. Doesn't always start on first try. Mysteriously stops playing for no apparent reason. Sometimes won't play the track that I select on the remote control. 80% of the time it's fine. I wish I'd have bought an extended warranty and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH R AROZARENA

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best gift I ever gave to myself before college start again. I'm planning to use it in my studio space and my bedroom. BTS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! An awesome CD player for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My youngest child loves listening to our old cd collection. We purchased this as a gift and they love it. I installed it on the wall over a desk. Installation was super easy. There is a string you can pull to turn it on and off - my child loves this feature. The sound quality is perfect! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my teen daughter, who absolutely loves it. I can say, I can now hear all of her musical choices no matter where I am in the house! It’s loud, it sounds good, and her taste in music is damn good! 😂
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but didn't like the instructions that came ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but didn't like the instructions that came with it. Had to google to get all the info I needed. But I'm happy with the product. The sound is really good and that's the real point. So I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Smith

customer_reviews.title: It looks clean and modern and we are very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Small size, but big sound. This is just what we needed and replaced a huge CD player that had stopped working. This little guy is attractive and takes up a lot less space. It looks clean and modern and we are very pleased with it. While others might like that it is also a wall mount, I like that it can lean against the stand that was provided with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for kid use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my children’s play room so they could listen to music while they have fun. It’s perfect to hang up high out of reach and it’s not an eye sore. Very nice sound and the blue tooth is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an elderly friend who loves music and is bedridden. I love the pull cord functionality and the ability to use USB! I was able to put much of her music on drives and she can use her 1 functional arm/hand to turn on and push in a USB. A very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and compact, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed! Easy to install on my daughter's bedroom wall, looks nice, great sound. She was thrilled to get it, she loves having the remote, I know she will be using it a lot. I wish I had a place for another one, they are so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Rori Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I rarely write reviews but this was something I’ve been wanting for 3 years. I’m so glad I finally got one! It suits my aesthetic perfectly, the sound is clear and the volume goes really high up! The Bluetooth feature works great especially for songs I don’t have on disc. I really recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Love Belt

customer_reviews.title: Does not read my Cd!
customer_reviews.text: My CD player would not read my cd! I mostly got this so I can play my albums but it won’t read my cds!!!! I know it’s not the cd because it works in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Tahauri

customer_reviews.title: The sound is very good. I really enjoy the Bluetooth function
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this CD player on a daily basis for about a month. I have been pleasantly surprised by this product. When I received it I was a little skeptical about the exposed CD, but so far it is working very well. The sound is very good. I really enjoy the Bluetooth function. The radio presets don’t seem to stay set would be my biggest complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Miki C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my oldest daughter to replace her beat-up one. It arrived on time, in great shape and was easy to install on her wall. She loves it and it's very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2CLandC

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boys’ room so they can listen to music and audio books. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected sound
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and my son loves it. Has cd and Bluetooth so it does exactly what he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather O

customer_reviews.title: Wasting my time returning product
customer_reviews.text: It didn't even make it through playing the first cd - and it has no cover - the cd and playing mechanism are exposed so if you plan on having any dust ever - it's not protected...I now have to spend the time to return it - don't buy this product...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, versatile, good sound for such a cheap speaker! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kekone

customer_reviews.title: FM radio!
customer_reviews.text: The CD player arrived today in excellent condition. The description didn't mention it was also an FM radio which was a wonderful surprise! The only drawback is that it came with preset stations and no digital view so you can't tell which station you are on. It has great sound and a nice long cord. This CD player is going to get a lot of use!
customer_reviews.author: Karleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and service!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is amazing! It can play the CD continuously if I don't stop it. I can also play the music in my computer and iPhone via bluetooth. In addition, I am satisfied with the effect of speaker. I did not mount the CD player on the wall. It came with a holder, so I leave it on my desk. When the product came, the remote control did not work. After I contacted the seller, they replied on the same day and send me a new one within few days. The service is also amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: but good sound reproduction and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well especially when we are traveling. Wish it had a cover over the CD, but good sound reproduction and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris at Bigfork, MT

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size just what I was looking for. I got this for my daughter for her birthday for auto books to be played on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great CD external drive with good sound and many features.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the CD player for a few days am enjoying it very much. It is very portable and versatile. The sound is good. So far I have used it to play CDs and conect it to my iPhone with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this, Ive seen people getting these and honestly I don’t regret getting it. The sound quality is so good and it’s easy to use, I would recommend others to get this
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews. But this one I feel the need to. Mine has stopped working in less than a year. I should have bought the warranty. But what for? If the product is trustworthy, there's no need. But less than a year is not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hottiekimmy

customer_reviews.title: CDs will not play after one year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until the CD part stopped working. We use it only occasionally, but it’s our only CD player in the house. Disappointed to see that part did after about a year.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our needs! Remote works, plays great, Bluetooth was easy to connect to.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Norseth

customer_reviews.title: Good cd player just not loud enough.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cd player so less bulky,easy to use. My only disappointment would be that it's not very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Utyson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work out of the box, an expensive piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Sorbel

customer_reviews.title: ... to my books in the morning and weekends and love it. Also use the Bluetooth to use Pandora
customer_reviews.text: Use this to listen to my books in the morning and weekends and love it. Also use the Bluetooth to use Pandora. Sounds good and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks so pretty and I was amazed by how good it sounded, I like that it has aux and Bluetooth! I can finally listen to my EXO albums!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Rios

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt read CDs/Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I could leave music on all day for my dog but SURPRISE. Doesnt read CD. Spins the CD, yeah, but no sound. Also tried bluetooth, it reads my device on all media, but no sound will come out at all. I'm pissed. This this is just a glorified AUX cable, since that's the only part that works.
customer_reviews.author: katie beall

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! Doesn't skip songs, only plays the first song of any CD then says ERROR and starts playing first song of CD again. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jtsainz

customer_reviews.title: 3 starts
customer_reviews.text: Very nice idea and design but CD player just play for a half year. I didn't use for everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month old and this CD player is rarely able to play through an entire CD and sometimes distorts the sound. It also stops at random points, often unable to play the next song. The remote track skipping also does not work, but rather jumps to the middle of songs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burton

customer_reviews.title: High recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to use, sound quality, super loud, and overall a great product, had it for over a year now, and works like new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: The best CD PLAYER we ever had. Very easy to operate. Great functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Keren clark

customer_reviews.title: No display
customer_reviews.text: With no display, there's no way to tell what track is playing or how to navigate to a particular one. The remote >>| button only advances to the next track sometimes. Other times it's a random jump forward.
customer_reviews.author: P. Grafton

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it, especially the pull on/off
customer_reviews.text: This cd player was more than I expected! Absolutely love it, especially the pull on/off switch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the power button doesn't always turn on the speaker but beyond that I love it. Easy to hook up your blu tooth as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plays CD’s, but won’t sync with wireless headphones, although the headphones sync with other Bluetooth devices
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter's birthday, arrived on time. Exactly as description.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. I purchased 9 months ago. It has had very light use and was not used consistently. Started skipping a little after 5 months. Now CD player does not work at all! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but remote wasn’t working
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well and sounds great but the remote wasn’t working. I’m assuming the battery is dead? Also when I pressed a button it got stuck, which was a bit disappointing. But other than that it cd player itself works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and makes a nice compliment to my crosley cruiser turntable
customer_reviews.text: Small compact. Plays well and was able to hook up to my Marshall speaker. Arrived on time and makes a nice compliment to my crosley cruiser turntable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Simonich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that it can be hung on the wall out of the way and used with a remote!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It sounds good, looks good, price was good, doesn't take up much space. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They jump and skip if they find the CD at all
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Product was poorly packaged and did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Product had fallen out of its box and was loose inside the Amazon delivery box. The product did not looked damaged but did not work at all as a CD Player.
customer_reviews.author: Silent D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me to listen to my old cd's on. Easy to use, great price and good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Noone

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a cheap speaker - poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a really cheap speaker. The concept is good, the features are good but the quality is bad. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Plays both Cd & USB.
customer_reviews.text: Great player for price. No cover for CD. No display at all for #.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice little radio
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice little radio, it was purchased for a massage room and is used daily, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: ... to use and program due to remote but sounds good and does its job
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to use and program due to remote but sounds good and does its job.
customer_reviews.author: scv shopper

customer_reviews.title: The sound is AWSOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for myself about a year ago and my dad loved it. So I ordered one for him for a early Christmas gift and he is a VERY Happy Dad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheba Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, good price, good quality. I using it just for listening some CD for kill time. It works and pretty convenience. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yizhao Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our children's​' room. I like it hanging on the wall, out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Sixponies

product_meta.title: CD Player, Wrcibo Wall Mountable Bluetooth CD Player Speaker Upgraded Version with Remote HiFi Speaker USB Drive Player and Aux in & Headphone Jack (White)
product_meta.description:
Color:White- Elegant sleek design, plays the role of home decor perfectly, sweat gift for your parents, husband, wife, kids and friends! 
- Built-in Full Band FM Radio, you can listen to music weather news and traffic in all FM stations, freely switch between different radio stations via the “Prev” and “Next” button on the player or remote controller 
- Come with a remote control, convenient to switch between different modes, skip, repeat, loop 
- Standard 3.5mm headphone & AUX jack, line-in to play music from devices without Bluetooth. Line-out for earphones or connecting to a larger stereo system. 
- Includes A-B Function in CD mode
- Support both single song loop and whole disc loop
- You can save 6 radio channels via the number dial on the remote controller
- Lightweight & Portable, measures 7.4*7.4*1.5 in, ultra portable, slim, lightweight, compact and you can carry and take along with it in your bag conveniently

100% Satisfaction Guarantee & 1-Year Warranty: 
Your satisfaction is out Top Priority! Each of the Wrcibo Wall Mountable CD Player comes with 7-day money back guarantee and 1-year warranty. 
If you’re not happy with it, just contact us for a hassle free refund or replacement. If you encounter any further issues, please freely get back to us for a solution within 24 hours. 

Specifications:
Dimensions: 189*189*37 mm/7.4*7.4*1.5 in
Material: ABS
Weight: 540 g/1.2lb
Input: AC 100-220V / DC 5V /2A
Audio support: CD/WMA/MP3
Rated Power: 2 *3W
Frequency Band: 87.5KHz-108.0MHz
Headphone/AUX jack: 3.5mm
Power Cord Length: 2.3 m/7.5 ft

What’s in the Box: 
1 x CD player
1 x 5V 2A USB adaptor
1 x Remote controller
1 x Wall mounted kit
1 x Wall mounted plate
1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: 【 Newest Version 】 upgraded with higher quality lossless sound and advanced Bluetooh 4.2. And You Can Totally Turn Off the Annoying Indicator Light by long press the power key on remote. No longer disturb your sleep at night as the old version does!

【 5 IN 1 FUNCTIONS 】 1) CD Player, 2) Bluetooth HiFi Speaker, 3) FM Radio, 4) USB Flash Drive Player, 5) Mini Home Boombox. Offer you all the convenience by modern tech. Play your favorite music in a party/studio/massage/yoga/casual time, or just use as a radio to get local news
【 WIDE COMPATIBILITY 】support CD/CD-R/CD-RW/MP3/WMA, play all kinds of CDs hassle free, built in Bluetooth and 3.5mm Aux in/out and headphone Jack, 1 USB port, supports USB flash
【 WALL MOUNTABLE 】 creative wall mountable design with pull switch, classic and space saving, comes with a stand as well. Just pull the power cable to turn it on/off.
【 1 YEAR WARRANTY 】 each cd player comes with 12-months FULL guarantee
